name: FuGenX Technologies
overview:
We are ISO 9001:2008 certified and got Deloitte’s 2012 award of India’s top 50 fastest Technology growing company and Deloitte Technology Fast500 Asia Pacific 2012 with over 100 professionals Developed more then 200+ Apps & Games; among them few are award winning and listed as Top 10 App in App store.

More than 97% of FuGenX clients reward the company’s delivery model, reliability, passion, creativity, and unique ability to handle the broadest range of their Mobile needs by continually extending their partnerships with FuGenX.

About FuGenX Technologies (www.fugenx.com )

• Our development Center is located in Bangalore, India with Sales representatives based in USA, UK, Middle east etc: • Developed more then 200+ Apps & Games; among them few are award winning and listed as Top 10 App in App store • ISO 9001:2008 certified and got Deloitte’s 2012 award of India’s top 50 fastest Technology growing company with over 100 professionals • Efficient Project Management model (Scrum) with dedicated specialized testing & QA team • Work on iPhone / iPad (Objective C, Xcode, Cocoa), Android (Java, Android SDK), Blackberry (J2ME, RIM), Windows, Phonegap, Sencha Touch, Games in IOS / Android (Cocos2D, Unity 3D etc)

We have professionals who can assist you with the following:

Native Apps Development: IOS (iPhone, iPad), Android, Blackberry, Symbian, Windows Cross Platform Apps Development: PhoneGap, HTML5, CSS, JS Game Development: Cocos2D, Box2D, Unity 3D Server App Development: PHP, MySQL, Java, ASP .NET

If you want to know more please visit: http://fugenx.com Contact: INDIA: 080-42411888 USA : 213 995 8091
